thread.section_title: Le Bristol Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful experience!
thread.title_full: Wonderful experience! - Review of Le Bristol Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: agardyz
title: Wonderful experience!
text:
I haven't had such an excellent and professional service for many years. except the last time I was at Le Bristol back in 2010. It's still one of the few hotels in Paris left in European hands. They are always pending and looking into the last details to better serve you.It's a real keeper.
Room Tip: Rooms looking to the internal patio are quieter, but all are great rooms. See more room tips
